name: elements
summary: Elements is a free online fantasy card game in which each player embodies an elemental – a spirit composed of an element. Elements are the fundamental building blocks of nature and express skills (unique to each element) that can be used in duels against another elemental.
info:
• 中文名: 元素
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: 卡牌对战
  • 游玩人数: 1/2
  • 发行日期: 2009年12月15日
  • 官方网站: http://www.elementsthegame.com/
